name: fandom

[ U ] the state of being a fan of someone or something, especially a very enthusiastic one: the world of martial arts movie fandom
[ C ] a group of fans of someone or something, especially very enthusiastic ones: Harry Potter fans have joined with members of fandoms from other popular books.
